duck: Congruence (geometry), being isometric â€” roughly, the same size and shape
congruence definition: the quality or state of agreeing, coinciding, or being congruent.

wiki.text:
In abstract algebra, a 'congruence relation' (or simply 'congruence') is an
equivalence relation on an algebraic structure (such as a group, ring, or vector
space) that is compatible with the structure. Every congruence relation has a
corresponding quotient structure, whose elements are the equivalence classes (or
'congruence classes') for the relation.
wiki.title: congruence%20relation
headings: Congruences of groups, and normal subgroups and ideals
